mapper.insert: insert into recipe(writer, title, thumbnail, content, ingredients, cookingtime, serving , category, regdate, star, tag) values(#{writer}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{ingredients}, #{cookingtime}, #{serving}, #{category}, now(), 0, #{tag})
mapper.select: select * from user where user_id = #{user_id} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(seq, content, writer ) values(#{seq}, #{content}, #{writer})
